description: Google Analytics 4 (GA4) integration - Analyze website traffic, user behavior, and performance metrics

metadata.short_description: Google Analytics 4 (GA4) - Analyze website traffic, user behavior, and performance metrics
metadata.mesh_description: **Google Analytics 4 MCP** provides comprehensive access to your GA4 data through powerful reporting tools. **Key Features** - Run custom reports with dimensions and metrics. - Get real-time analytics (last 30 minutes). - Pre-configured reports (overview, traffic sources, page performance, geo, devices, events). - Property and data stream management. - Support for date comparisons and advanced filtering. **Use Cases** - Track website traffic and user engagement. - Analyze traffic sources and campaigns. - Monitor page performance and user behavior. - Get real-time visitor insights. - Generate custom analytics reports. **Authentication** - Uses Google OAuth 2.0 with Analytics API scopes. Requires Viewer access to GA4 properties. Perfect for marketers, analysts, and developers who need programmatic access to Google Analytics data.
